::KitKat::
She smiled at them, "Thank you both. Please take then to the 
transport pod on the east side of the ship, we will leave shortly 
when all the supplies are loaded,"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Obsidian/Bludgeon:::
> 
> ::Obsidian and Bludgeon receive Kitkats transmission nad go to the 
hold::
> Bludgeon: good to see you again Obsidian.
> Obsidian: Yes its been too long.
> ::Back in the great war Obsidian was a general under Bludgeon's 
leadership::
> Obsidian: How is it that you are alive?
> Bludgeon: As you know, i was destroyed by the original Megatron and 
used as 
> parts for his Warworld.  When the quantum surge hit me, i became a 
Transmetal 
> and lost my Pretender shell.  I wandered the universe for ages 
until i found 
> earth.  Now i have joined the Predacons.
> ::They finish gathering the weapons, pack them up, and take them to 
KitKat::
> Obsidian: We have finished.
